Text.Page:
The fierce resistance of the Atel Akaad is frightening. It's as if something were controlling them.

Go kill the {@LinkCreature:25#1021#devan prelates} and {@LinkCreature:25#1022#skeletal wardens}. We'll see if anything changes. Maybe they're controlling the beasts.
A psycho-suppressive shackle! So this is how they were controlling the Atel Akaad!
There must be something that keeps those dread knights leashed.
